item.title: Hugo Quickstart
item.description: Hugo Quick Start Step 1: Install Hugo Homebrew and MacPorts, package managers for macOS, can be installed from brew.sh or macports.org respectively. See install if you are running Windows etc. brew install hugo # or port install hugo To verify your new install: hugo version Step 2: Create a New Site hugo new site quickstart The above will create a new Hugo site in a folder named quickstart. Step 3: Add a Theme See themes.

item.title: About
item.description: Hey! Welcome to my personal website. I am Kenvin Jo, an Engineer from Beijing city, China. I have been working for a long time in various internet-related areas, including website development, system administration of large and high-loaded systems. Specialties: Linux system administration,database administrator,network engineer distributed and high-loaded web server systems, building compete service infrastructure. I love to talk with you about my unique.
